skins.selfIntroduction: I¡¯m Scharnhorst. I will stand until the last moment of any battle. This is my determination, as well as my pride. Leave all the fighting to me!
skins.acquisition: In Scharnhorst's dictionary, the word "retreat" simply doesn't exist! You're the Commander? Let me see what you've got.
skins.login: You're back? Good timing. I'm just about to test my guns.
skins.details: Only those who have not been scarred would laugh at someone else's.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Those lightweight aircraft carriers simply can't match our combat abilities!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Do me a favor and remind our friends not to sail directly in front of me... I might not be able to resist firing at them...
skins.secretaryIdle3: "The Ugly Sisters"? Hmph, it's not a bad name... Sounds like a good name for this war, too...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Stand right there, Commander. If you can take a shot from me, I'll forgive you...

skins.shipDescription: A festival, huh? Going for days without fighting is boring, not to mention not my style. C'mon, Commander, isn't there *something* exciting I can do during this "Lunar New Year" festival?
